Protocol on cooperation between Pyongyang and Moscow inked 
    Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A protocol on cooperation between Pyongyang and Moscow was signed here today.
 Present at the signing ceremony were Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, and officials concerned and Yuri Mikhailovich Luzhkov, Mayor of Moscow, and his party and Andrei Gennadievich Karlov, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK.    
 The protocol was signed by Ryang and Luzhkov.
